main

Class TrackLayerCompound

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.TrackLayerCompound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TLCParent, Track, TransientContainer<TLCParent>

    public class TrackLayerCompound
extends java.lang.Object
implements Track, TransientContainer<TLCParent>, TLCParent
    Contains tracks
    A new blank MetaSamples object is created, all tracks process that, and that object is finally layered onto the given one
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTo(MetaSamples current)
      Take the existing samples and do whatever with them
      Can overlay audio data, apply effects, etc.
      double[] getTimeBounds()
      Get the track bounds as double array
      First element is minimum/left/start
      Second element is maximum/right/end
      All are in seconds relative to very beginning
      MetaComponent<javax.swing.JInternalFrame> getUI()
      Request UI with metadata
      If the returned value is an instance of JInternalFrame it will be displayed separately and tracked by the window manager

      Get component to display inline in the track viewer which would be part of a TrackLayerCompound's UI

        public double[] getTimeBounds()
        Description copied from interface: Track
        Get the track bounds as double array
        First element is minimum/left/start
        Second element is maximum/right/end
        All are in seconds relative to very beginning
        Specified by:

        Returns:
